languages.text: {n}Супруга Махария дарит вам очаровательную улыбку, словно извиняясь за желчный тон мужа. В огромных темных глазах плещется любопытство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Супруга Махария дарит вам очаровательную улыбку, словно извиняясь за желчный тон мужа. В огромных темных глазах плещется любопытство.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius's wife offers you a charming smile, as if apologising for her husband's vitriolic tone. Her large dark eyes are brimming with curiosity.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Супруга Махария дарит вам очаровательную улыбку, словно извиняясь за желчный тон мужа. В огромных темных глазах плещется любопытство.{/n}

{n}Macharius's wife offers you a charming smile, as if apologising for her husband's vitriolic tone. Her large dark eyes are brimming with curiosity.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マハリウスの妻は夫の辛辣な物言いを謝罪するかのように、あなたに向かって感じよく微笑みかける。大きく黒い瞳は好奇心にあふれている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius's wife offers you a charming smile, as if apologising for her husband's vitriolic tone. Her large dark eyes are brimming with curiosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスの妻は夫の辛辣な物言いを謝罪するかのように、あなたに向かって感じよく微笑みかける。大きく黒い瞳は好奇心にあふれている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯的妻子对你露出了迷人的微笑，似乎在为她丈夫尖刻的语气道歉。她乌黑的大眼睛里充满了好奇。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius's wife offers you a charming smile, as if apologising for her husband's vitriolic tone. Her large dark eyes are brimming with curiosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯的妻子对你露出了迷人的微笑，似乎在为她丈夫尖刻的语气道歉。她乌黑的大眼睛里充满了好奇。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La esposa de Macharius te ofrece una sonrisa encantadora, a modo de disculpa por el tono vehemente de su marido. Sus grandes ojos oscuros rebosan curiosidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius's wife offers you a charming smile, as if apologising for her husband's vitriolic tone. Her large dark eyes are brimming with curiosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La esposa de Macharius te ofrece una sonrisa encantadora, a modo de disculpa por el tono vehemente de su marido. Sus grandes ojos oscuros rebosan curiosidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Comme pour excuser la virulence de son mari, la femme de Macharius vous offre un sourire charmeur. Ses grands yeux sombres brillent de curiosité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius's wife offers you a charming smile, as if apologising for her husband's vitriolic tone. Her large dark eyes are brimming with curiosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme pour excuser la virulence de son mari, la femme de Macharius vous offre un sourire charmeur. Ses grands yeux sombres brillent de curiosité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius' Frau lächelt dich charmant an, als wolle sie sich für den ätzenden Ton ihres Mannes entschuldigen. In ihren großen braunen Augen funkelt Neugier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius's wife offers you a charming smile, as if apologising for her husband's vitriolic tone. Her large dark eyes are brimming with curiosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius' Frau lächelt dich charmant an, als wolle sie sich für den ätzenden Ton ihres Mannes entschuldigen. In ihren großen braunen Augen funkelt Neugier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius'un karısı, kocasının iğneleyici ses tonu için özür dilercesine bir cana yakınlıkla sana gülümsüyor. İri ve koyu renkli gözleri, merak dolu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius's wife offers you a charming smile, as if apologising for her husband's vitriolic tone. Her large dark eyes are brimming with curiosity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius'un karısı sana cana yakın bir şekilde gülümsüyor, kocasının iğneleyici ses tonu için özür dilercesine. İri ve koyu renkli gözleri, merakla dolu.{/n}
